mapper.insert: insert into kakao_donation(content_idx, member_idx, donation, comments, date_donation) values (#{content_idx}, #{member_idx}, #{price}, #{comment}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select a.content_idx, a.donation, TO_CHAR(a.date_donation, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as date_donation, a.member_idx, b.title, b.image0 from kakao_donation a left outer join kakao_board b on a.content_idx = b.idx where a.member_idx = #{member_idx}
